rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124307

definition: Terminology relevant to the intended disease outcome for which the treatment is given.
name: Treatment Intent

terms.definition: Any action or response that serves to eliminate disease and prevent recurrence.
Any action or response, without curative intent, that mitigates some or all of the unpleasant effects of a disease or condition.
Any action or response to modify or stop the development of a disease.
Any action or process to maximize comfort, minimize side effects, or mitigate against a decline in the participant's health or function. (clinicaltrials.gov)
